name: Hexa Hero Match
description:
Hexa Hero Match is an easy to understand yet fun to master puzzle game.
It is a game that you’ll love.
Just tap and move blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to level up.

FEATURES
- Addictive gameplay
- Quick & Easy to Learn
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
- Smooth gameplay
- No Time Limit
